comment: Associativity of extended real addition. The correct condition here is "it is not the case that both ` +oo ` and ` -oo ` appear as one of ` A , B , C ` , i.e. ` -. { +oo , -oo } C_ { A , B , C } ` ", but this condition is difficult to work with, so we break the theorem into two parts: this one, where ` -oo ` is not present in ` A , B , C ` , and ~ xaddass2 , where ` +oo ` is not present.
